Body: I have created the soil irrigation system using arduino for my University Year-End Project. Then I want to connect cloud and android app with my system by getting watering plants, time and open/close valve by using android application... I have no better idea for to do this, because I'm new to this subject..Anyone can Please Help me..

Since you are a begginer, i would suggest you use Firebase, since it has a really easy integration with Arduino and Android. There is no official android library for firebase but i used this https://github.com/firebase/firebase-arduino for several projects and it works like a charm. For android you get enough study material through a google search. It is very simple
column10: reliable. Basically you share a common database. You can either write in firebase from app
column11: then read in arduino (use this for open/close valve) or you can write from arduino and read in app (get sensor data or smt). Do some research
column13:
come back with more concrete questions. Good luck! :D
